    Reference

    All functions

    CAS2SMILES()

    Convert CAS to SMILES

    CTS.externalIdSubset()

    Select a subset of external IDs from a CTS record.

    CTS.externalIdTypes()

    Find all available databases for a CTS record

    loadRmbSettings() loadRmbSettingsFromEnv() RmbDefaultSettings() RmbSettingsTemplate()

    RMassBank settings

    RmbSettings

    RMassBank settings

    `-`(<RmbSpectraSet>,<ANY>)

    Add a negative mass shift to a list of spectra

    RmbSpectraSet-class .RmbSpectraSet

    Set of spectra pertaining to one compound

    RmbSpectrum2-class .RmbSpectrum2

    RMassBank Representation of an MSMS Spectrum

    `-`(<RmbSpectrum2List>,<ANY>)

    Add a negative mass shift to a list of spectra

    RmbSpectrum2List-class .RmbSpectrum2List RmbSpectraSetList RmbSpectraSetList-class .RmbSpectraSetList

    SimpleList specializations

    `-`(<Spectrum>,<numeric>)

    Add a negative mass shift to a spectrum

    findMass()

    findMsMsHR() findMsMsHR.mass()

    findMz() findRt() findSmiles() findFormula() findCAS() findName() findLevel()

    Find compound information

    findMz.formula()

    Find the exact mass +/- a given margin for a given formula or its ions and adducts.
